name: Pickey
description:
A game made for the 72 hour Ludum Dare 52 with the theme "Harvest"!

I had a lot less time for this than I’d like, a full day less than my usual games, so I feel like I did alright given the extra time constraints.

This is a game about pulling stuff out of the ground!

Built using OpenXR, should work with any headset on PC.
